scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Ivy
scrape.text: I read this book because I saw a lot of reviews that compared it to Gone Girl, which I enjoyed. While both books have unreliable narrators and morally absent characters, the resemblance pretty much ends there. I finished this book feeling that a lot of things didn't quite make sense and with a lot of remaining questions. I especially had trouble with the concept that mental illnesses can be inherited and detected in amniotic fluid before a child is born -- really?
